Text: Re Brokerage Account for EES affiliategreat to hear from you The entity requiring the brokerage account is Enron Energy Services Limited which is a UK entity This company is buying of the shares of a UK engineering firm called Torpy in order to use in its facilities management business here The purchase price for Torpy is million million of which is payable in Enron Corp stock For tax reasons this Enron stock needs to be purchased in the market rather than using treasury shares Thanks for the tip on account signatories Please let me know what else I need to do Thanks again Sara Shackleton To Mary Nell CT cc Marie CT Lori ES Subject Brokerage Account for EES affiliate Hello there Hope all is well Will you be at the legal conference later this month Would you please provide us with information identifying the specific entity requiring the brokerage account and a brief description of the transaction for which the account is required Also for purposes of your unanimous consent or resolution you should note that either of Ted Murphy or Rick Buy should be one of the two signatories required for opening the account Let me know if you have any questions Sara
